mapper.update: update driver_information set d_name = #{dName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_sex = #{dSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_uuid = #{dUuid,jdbcType=CHAR}, d_phone = #{dPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_password = #{dPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card = #{card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, d_balance = #{dBalance,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, register_date = #{registerDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select d_id, d_name, d_sex, d_uuid, d_phone, d_password, card, d_balance, register_date from driver_information
